statement: set @FirstTime = 1602720000; set @LastTime = 1604534400; select m.time, m.sta_id as madis_id, m.temp, m.dp, m.slp, m.wd, m.ws, c.ceil, v.vis100 as vis from madis3.obs m, ceiling2.obs c, visibility.obs v where 1 = 1 AND m.time >= @FirstTime and m.time <= @LastTime AND c.time >= @FirstTime AND c.time <= @LastTime AND v.time >= @FirstTime AND v.time <= @LastTime and m.time = c.time and m.time = v.time and m.sta_id = c.madis_id and m.sta_id = v.madis_id;
